function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of thorough safety and economic studies for far-uvc light","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 is increased in indoor environments with relaxed restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air disinfection strategies leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education regarding the importance of ventilation and airflow control in disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hazard elimination measures for potential exposure to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of administrative controls for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality exacerbating the spread of airborne viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The need for targeted policy changes across public health, urban planning, and architectural design sectors","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large scientific literature on covid-19 and public health intervention.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution increasing susceptibility to sars-cov-2 infection.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective infection control and prevention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research and understanding of pandemic viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spreading of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High association of covid-19 infection with air pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in shared office spaces and co-working environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High density in offices and shared facilities leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctance to use elevators in high-rise buildings due to disease transmission concerns.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The potential for ongoing covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a single antivirus strategy","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility and responsiveness in addressing pandemics","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density in urban areas leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on telecommuting and digital communication leading to reduced social interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the long-term impact of the pandemic and future social effects","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of design to limit effects of pandemics in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Cities being tested during the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable development goals focused on human health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased virtual and augmented reality use may lead to prolonged screen time and potential health issues.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear long-term impact of increased remote working on mental health and social connections.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of touchless technologies may create a false sense of security and lead to neglect of other hygiene practices.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential infection risks within the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with nanomaterials and nanotechnology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adaptive reuse strategy leading to the potential exposure of workers and healthcare professionals to contaminated materials or surfaces from the existing structures being converted.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased contagion in multi-story buildings due to high contact surfaces like elevator buttons and door handles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of poor indoor air quality leading to sick-building syndrome","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelmed healthcare systems and inadequate medical facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decentralization may lead to inefficient distribution of resources and services, making it difficult to provide adequate healthcare and education in certain areas.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequately planned urban farming may lead to environmental degradation and unsustainable land use practices.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Controversy surrounding the impact of higher density on social interactions and sustainability","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased density in offices due to altered office spaces and remote working policies","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased cost and inefficiency of high-rise buildings due to altered office space requirements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social isolation and protection from viruses in housing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adaptation in housing and office design to accommodate workspaces and reduce density could lead to prolonged health risks and reduced productivity.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient construction strategies and materials could contribute to suboptimal building designs and delay the implementation of health-conscious features.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to working from home for some people based on socioeconomic status, leading to challenges in social distancing and infection prevention.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges with social distancing and infection prevention in smaller and crowded houses or spaces without outside areas.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on urban design and public spaces, with potential for increased risk of disease transmission in crowded urban environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population density in cities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Household size and family structure","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical pandemics like cholera, typhoid, tuberculosis, and the third plague pandemic have influenced the design and infrastructure of the built environment, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Historical risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
